conclusion: Analyze the flow path from each entry point (A, B, C, and D) to the containers.
Identify the entry points: A is Green, B is Orange, C is Green, D is Blue.
Liquid flows down the green bar from A and encounters a yellow bar.
Liquid flows down the yellow bar from A and reaches the bottom.
The path from A leads directly to container E.
Liquid flows down the orange bar from B and encounters a yellow bar.
Liquid flows down the yellow bar from B and reaches the bottom.
The path from B leads directly to container E.
Liquid flows down the green bar from C and encounters a yellow bar.
Liquid flows down the yellow bar from C and reaches the bottom.
The path from C leads directly to container E.
Liquid flows down the blue bar from D and encounters a yellow bar.
Liquid flows down the yellow bar from D and reaches the bottom.
The path from D leads directly to container E.
All flow paths from A, B, C, and D lead to container E.
The liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
